description: Intended for vocal music education and choral church music students, this course introduces fundamental characteristics of orchestra and band instruments, including ranges and transpositions. Students study and learn to use basic approaches to scoring, orchestration, and arranging. Prerequisite: Music 214. Offered fall semester 2012-13 and alternate years.
name: Instrumentation
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 214. Offered fall semester 2012-13 and alternate years.
title: Instrumentation for Vocalists
